ARABIC: وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The legions of the heavens and the earth belong to Allah. Allah is Almighty, All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For God's are the armies of the heavens and the earth; and God is all-knowing and all-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: To Allah belong the legions of the heavens and the earth. Allah is Most Mighty, Most Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: To God belong the armies of the heavens and the earth. God is Majestic and All-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And to Allah only belong the armies of the heavens and the earth; and Allah is Most Honourable, Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And to Allah belong the armies of the heavens and the earth. And Allah is Ever All-Powerful, All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Allah's are the hosts of the heavens and the earth; and Allah is Mighty, Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: To God belong the hosts of the heavens and the earth; God is All-mighty, All-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Allah's are the hosts of the heavens and the earth, and Allah is ever Mighty, Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The forces of heavens and earth belong to God; He is almighty and all wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Allah's are the hosts of the heavens and the earth, and Allah is ever Mighty, Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: To Allah belong the hosts of the heavens and the earth, and Allah is all-mighty, all-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For to Allah belong the Forces of the heavens and the earth; and Allah is Exalted in Power, Full of Wisdom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And to Allah belong the hosts of the heavens and the earth. And Allah is Ever All-Knower, All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: To Allah belong the armies of the heavens and the earth. Allah is the Almighty and the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: To God belong the troops of the heavens and the earth. God is Mighty and Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And to Allah belong the soldiers of the heavens and the earth. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [48:7] And to God belong the hosts of the heavens and the earth; and God is ever Mighty, in His kingdom, Wise, in His actions, in other words, He is ever possessed of such attributes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Allah's are the hosts of the heavens) the angels (and the earth) the believers; He gives help to whomever He will, (and Allah is ever Mighty) in retribution against the disbelievers and hypocrites, (Wise) in bestowing honour on true believers because of their faith; and it is also said that this means: Allah is ever Mighty in His 596 dominion and sovereignty, Wise in His command, decree and help of His Prophet against his enemies.
